dct_title_s:
A new Map of Africa Designed by Mounſir Sanſon, Geographr to the French
          King. Rendered into Engliſh and Illuſtrated with Figurs by Richard Blome by
          the Kings Eſpeciall Command
dct_description_sm:
Similar to Sanson's map (see NOR 0035). Blome added ships, sea monsters and the
        dedication to the Right Honourable Charles Howard.
dct_rights_sm: Image from the Dr. Oscar I. Norwich collection of maps of Africa and its islands, 1486 - ca. 1865 courtesy Stanford University Libraries. This item is in the public domain. There are no restrictions on use. If you have questions, please contact the David Rumsey Map Center at rumseymapcenter@stanford.edu.
